description: Detached single storey outbuilding for use as Gym/Storage/Workshop
decision_conditions: <p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size:12pt;"><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif">The proposed outbuilding by reason of its excessive mass and bulk would be a visually obtrusive&nbsp;form of development causing an unacceptable degree of&nbsp;overbearing and loss of outlook concerns when viewed from the neighbouring&nbsp;occupiers Nos 28 and 32 Kenton Lane, contrary to the high quality design aspirations of the National Planning Policy Framework (2024), Policy D3 D.1, D.7 and D.11 of The London Plan (2021), Core policy CS1B of the Harrow Core Strategy (2012), Policy DM1 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013), and the adopted Supplementary Planning Document: Residential Design Guide (2010<strong>).</strong></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal">The proposed outbuilding by reason of its excessive depth and
height would be unduly bulky, disproportionate, incongruous and out of
character with the prevailing pattern of development in the area, causing visual harm to the character and appearance of the immediate area contrary
to the high quality design aspirations of the National Planning Policy
Framework (2024), Policy D3 D.1, D.7 and D.11 of The&nbsp; London Plan (2021),
Core policy CS1B of the Harrow Core Strategy (2012), Policy DM1 of the Harrow
Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013), and the adopted
Supplementary Planning Document: Residential Design Guide (2010).<o:p></o:p></p>
